attributes.action: Withdraw from the european human rights bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since this government signed up to this bill we have lost control of our country and common sence, police now cannot show the the faces of people on the run in case of the human rights, As Mick Martin the speaker says, Lets have order!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
